net.viktorc.detroid.util

Class SizeEstimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.viktorc.detroid.util.SizeEstimator

  • public class SizeEstimator
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton utility class for estimating the memory footprints of objects on the (HotSpot) JVM heap.
    Author:
    Viktor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      static SizeEstimator getInstance()
      Returns the single existing SizeEstimator instance.

      Statically estimates the size of the instance of a class.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static SizeEstimator getInstance()
        Returns the single existing SizeEstimator instance.
        Returns:
        A singleton instance.

      • getNonStaticFields

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.reflect.Field> getNonStaticFields(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Returns an array list of all the non-static fields of a class including the non-static fields of all of its ancestors.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class.
        Returns:
        A list of its non-static fields including those inherited.

      • isInstanceSizeConstant

        public boolean isInstanceSizeConstant(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Returns whether all instances of the specified class must have the same memory requirements. This can be only guaranteed if all the non static fields of the class are primitives.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class.
        Returns:
        Whether the size of its instances is constant.

      • sizeOf

        public long sizeOf(java.lang.Object o)
        Estimates the size of an object including the sizes of all objects referenced in the object graph. It traverses an acyclic graph by not visiting nodes more than once and thus ensuring that even if there are multiple references pointing to the same object, its size is added to the graph's total size only once.
        Parameters:
        o - The object.
        Returns:
        The size of the object.

      • sizeOf

        public long sizeOf(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Statically estimates the size of the instance of a class. The estimate is only reliable if isInstanceSizeConstant returns true, i.e. all the non static fields of the class and its ancestors are primitives. The non-primitive non-static fields are assumed to be null references.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class.
        Returns:
        The static size of the class.
